data.text: @JuMu7397 @Naperdebunker @mom_naperville Here is the video of the Naperville board meeting on 2/22 - Blakey’s anti-lgbtq remarks begin at 48 minutes - Blakey represents the terrible views of @awake_il https://t.co/xSwaIGXLwl

@theheatherdebby @mom_naperville The “cowboy” is a fake cowboy from some farm in downstate Illinois that has no kids and seems to have nothing better to do with his time but hang out with the losers in @Awake_IL - it’s really strange to be honest 🤦‍♂️
@mom_naperville Isn’t more than one white supremacist gathered together referred to as a ‘twat’? I’ll use it in a sentence…What a disgusting twat of smug self-important white supremacists…🧐😳🤣
@theheatherdebby @mom_naperville Well, the short answer is 'he's a choad'

@mom_naperville What a collection of fucking assholes
